column4: HP dv7-3183cl laptop with Nvidia G105M using Nvidia driver locks up after logging into display manager.  The animation thing starts, distorts, then freezes the machine (on Karmic)
HP dv7-3183cl laptop with Lucid alpha 3 doesn't recognize the wireless adapter.
I posted problem about Karmic too.  Man, you guys are cranky.
complaining will get you nowhere, everyone here is a volunteer, please remember that
It's not complaining.  It's constructive criticism.
anything recent that is not a netbook
Thanks but I just bought this new HP and it is not working so well.
Default driver worked, but I bought this 1000 dollar laptop for graphics performance.  I want the accelerated Nvidia driver.
well the 105M is a lot of things, but not performance, heh. activating the proposed nvidia driver caused problems then?
Please tell me exactly what laptop you would recommend then.
for graphics performance no laptop really is recommended tbh, unless you mean just some 3d effects, then any nvidia card will suffice
what went wrong with installing the nvidia binary driver, 105m isnt really new and should be well supported by nvidia by now
For my job, I must use a laptop.  That is a constraint.  "any nvidia" will not suffice as I have demonstrated.
it works, just not the binary driver appearantly, but so far i dont know why
